meanings.sent1: The eelgrasses swayed gently in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study eelgrasses to understand their role in marine ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous seagull tried to hide in the eelgrasses, thinking it was camouflage.
meanings.sent4: The eelgrasses danced like underwater forests in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green eelgrasses added a touch of color to the ocean floor.

meanings.definition: Eelgrasses: a type of seagrass commonly found in coastal areas
meanings.sent1: The eelgrasses provide shelter for small fish along the coast.
meanings.sent2: Tourists enjoy snorkeling among the eelgrasses to see marine life up close.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek among the eelgrasses at the beach.
meanings.sent4: The eelgrasses whispered secrets to the waves as they swayed in the tide.
meanings.sent5: The scent of saltwater mingled with the fresh aroma of the eelgrasses near the shore.
